name: BacteriaCausingMeningitisTestsByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Bacteria [Causing Meningitis] (Tests by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with Meningitis-causing bacteria by culture and identification tests),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Meningitis-causing bacteria by culture and identification tests),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
